name: Defendron
description:
Epic, action-packed tower Defense!

Currently Acts 0-1 are available! More coming in future!

Descend further into the depths of Defendron city, the most secure place in the new world. Get ready to defend yourself against cyberpunk invaders in this epic tower defense game set in a futuristic world. With five acts set on different floors of a towering metropolis, you'll face increasingly challenging waves of enemies as you work your way down from the very top to the bottom of the city.

In Defendron, you must strategically place and upgrade a variety of towers to fend off the waves of enemies that move through the city. Each tower has unique abilities and playstyle, which can be altered or enhanced by the modules you mount.

As you progress through the game, you'll face increasingly challenging enemies as well as changing environment. They may start as simple foes, but as you delve deeper into the city, they begins to develop new abilities, strengths and counter strategies that will test your skills.

Build and upgrade your towers wisely to gain the upper hand in this awesome game.

Can you defend the city and emerge victorious in Defendron?
